title: Qareh Chay Rural District
text: Qareh Chay Rural District () is a <a href="Rural%20Districts%20of%20Iran">rural district</a> ("dehestan") in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Saveh%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Saveh%20County">Saveh County</a>, <a href="Markazi%20Province">Markazi Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 9,956, in 2,277 families. The rural district has 27 villages.
